high_impact_events.headline: Nvidia Attempts To Improve Gaming Card Supply With Two Big Actions - Forbes
high_impact_events.summary: NVIDIA plans to release stocks of older GPUs like RTX 2060, GTX 1050 Ti to help stabilize the GPU shortage issue.
high_impact_events.rationale: This event addresses a critical problem in the gaming industry by providing alternative options for consumers and businesses who need gaming hardware but are currently facing shortages.

medium_impact_events.headline: NVIDIA Launches Dedicated CMP HX Mining GPUs To Free Up GeForce RTX 3060 For Gamers - Hot Hardware
medium_impact_events.summary: NVIDIA releases new mining GPUs to free up the supply of their gaming-focused RTX 3060 cards for consumer use.
medium_impact_events.rationale: This strategic move allows NVIDIA to balance different market demands and ensure that both gaming enthusiasts and cryptocurrency miners can access the hardware they need.
